46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar, may Allah be pleased with them both, that:a woman used, to borrow jewelry from people then keep it. The Messenger of Allah said: "Let this woman repent to Allah and His Messenger and give back to people what she has taken." Then the Messenge of Allah said "Get up, O Bilal, take her hand and cut it off

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَكُونُ حِرْزًا وَمَا لاَ يَكُونُ
chapter.eng-name: Stealing Something that Is Kept In A Protected Place
